name: Green Knight of the Woods
description: The Green Knight of the Woods embodies a strong fey presence with a plate and shield, showcasing its formidable defensive capabilities.
memorable: The ability to reattach its head makes the Green Knight a terrifying opponent, ensuring it can't easily be defeated.
goals: Enforcing order within its domain and challenging intruders to engage in combat.
relations: Often interacts with woodland creatures, as it can communicate with beasts and plants.
environment: Typically found in wooded or natural areas that reflect its connection to nature.
strengths: Magical resistance and ability to compel foes into melee combat gives it a significant advantage on the battlefield.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold iron attacks and has a limited range of offensive spells.
attacks: Multiattack with a battle axe, shield bash that grapples, and javelin throw.
most_powerful_ability: Headsman's Woe which allows it to reattach its head if severed.
equipment: Plate armor and a shield, as well as a battle axe.
skills: Skilled in athletics, intimidation, and survival, excelling as a tracker and formidable socialite.
additional_information: Magic resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can issue a challenge to compel a creature into melee combat.
Immune to being charmed or frightened.
Can make a retaliatory attack when challenged.
Possesses a strong physical presence with good strength.
test_queries: forest guardian that reattaches its head
strong knight that compels foes to fight
durable fey with head reattachment ability
